channel.title: When i attack my weapon goes invisable
channel.description: im not sure why but every item on my server goes invisable when i attack any npc doesnt matter what weapon i use it goes invisable not sure what i did but its doing it now if anyone knows how to fix please respond thanks would help a great deal
